Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
cash and cash equivalents fair value disclosure
restricted cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Marketable Securities (Short-term): available for sale securities debt securities current
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: assets subjecttoor availablefor operating lease net current
Receivables: notes and loans receivable net current
loans and leases receivable net reported amount

Deferred Tax Assets: deferred tax assets liabilities net current
Other Non-Current Assets: notes and loans receivable net noncurrent
operating lease right of use asset noncurrent
property subject to or available for operating lease net
restricted cash and cash equivalents noncurrent
Property, Plant, and Equipment (net): property plant and equipment excluding lessor asset under operating lease after accumulated depreciation

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax

Short-term Debt: line of credit facility amount outstanding

Long-term Debt: long term debt and capital lease obligations
Other Non-Current Liabilities: defined benefit pension plan liabilities noncurrent
other postretirement defined benefit plan liabilities noncurrent

__unmapped__: accounts notes and loans receivable net current
assets of disposal group including discontinued operation current
disposal group including discontinued operation assets noncurrent
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation current
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation noncurrent
redeemable noncontrolling interest equity carrying amount
